attributes.action: Only soldiers aged 21 and over be allowed to serve on the front line
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A minimum age of 21 should be       
  introduced before a soldier  
  is allowed to risk his life and serve
  on the front line.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
